name: RespawnPlatformer
description:
Player plays as a platform. Every time you die, you will respawn as random kind of platform. Game may have many bugs but hope you enjoy.

For now there are 8 kind of platform, which are:

  1. normal platform
  2. invisible platform
  3. platform with a round saw
  4. portal entrance
  5. portal exit
  6. platform move horizontally
  7. platform move vertically
  8. resilient platform

Made for Ludum Dare 43.
